alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Eastern Alachua; Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Inland St. Johns; Western Clay; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 10 at 11:12AM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Bradford, northeastern Alachua, west central St. Johns, Putnam and southern Clay Counties through NOON EST... At 1111 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Orange Heights, or near Melrose, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds of 40 to 45 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Palatka, Green Cove Springs, Interlachen, Keystone Heights, Melrose, East Palatka, Hawthorne, Florahome, Melrose Landing and Federal Point. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Bradford; Eastern Alachua; Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Inland St. Johns; Western Clay; Western Putnam
